title: Border Fragments, 17th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: supplementary warp forming cut and uncut raised pile in satin foundation (velvet)
provenance: ex. coll. Antonio Vivès y Escudero
description: Symmetrical design of scrolls, birds, and mythical creatures in green cut and uncut velvet pile on yellow satin field. Selvage along right side of component a.

tombstone.epitaph:
Border Fragments, 17th century.
17th century. Medium: silk
Technique: supplementary warp forming cut and uncut raised pile in satin foundation (velvet). Gift of John Pierpont Morgan. 1902-1-572-a,b.
